Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: (Are they all hers or do they belong to someone else?)

Choices.Choice3: Ask about the owner of hats

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: Miss Hartington, I noticed you have many beautiful hats with you.
Speaker.line2: Are they all yours?

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: Miss Hartington, I noticed you have many beautiful hats with you.
Speaker.line2: Do you like wearing them?

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: I like your hats, Miss Hartington.

Speaker.name: Evelyn_Happy
Speaker.line1: You could say it's my hobby.
Speaker.line2: I like collecting beautiful hats.

Speaker.name: Nathaniel_Normal
Speaker.line1: You should see her room, TONS of hat.

Speaker.name: Evelyn_Happy
Speaker.line2: Thank you, I picked them out carefully.

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line2: Are you collecting them?

Speaker.name: Evelyn_Happy
Speaker.line1: I guess you could say that.

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: You have a very interesting hobby.

Choices.Choice1: Why are you interested in hats?

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: What made you interested in hats?

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: And also an uncommon one as well.

Speaker.name: Evelyn_Happy
Speaker.line1: I think all hats are so unique...
Speaker.line2: I like the story behind each of them.

Speaker.name: Evelyn_Happy
Speaker.line1: Like this one, my mother bought it for me on the first day of school!

Speaker.name: Evelyn_Happy
Speaker.line1: Wearing it makes me feel a bit more confident.

Speaker.name: Evelyn_Normal
Speaker.line1: I appreciate your eagerness... but it's against etiquette.
Speaker.line2: You shouldn't wear a hat while in the vehicle.

Speaker.name: Nathaniel_Happy
Speaker.line1: Hey! No need for the sudden attack!

Speaker.name: Evelyn_Normal
Speaker.line1: A lot of people do say that to me...

Speaker.name: Evelyn_Happy
Speaker.line1: But I believe it does no harm... so I don't pay it much mind.

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line2: You're braver than you look, Miss Hartington.

Speaker.name: Evelyn_Happy
Speaker.line2: When it comes to our favorite things,
Speaker.line3: a girl must stand up for her own self.

Speaker.name: Evelyn_Happy
Speaker.line1: What's your favorite type of hat?

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line2: The fabulous-looking ones.

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line2: Like the one I'm wearing.

Speaker.name: Nathaniel_Normal
Speaker.line1: Eve doesn't not like that kind of hat.
Speaker.line2: She's more into the plain ones.

Speaker.name: Evelyn_Upset
Speaker.line2: I like this one...

Speaker.name: Evelyn_Upset
Speaker.line2: Actually...

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: (She must like fancy hats, like the ones she has.)

Choices.Choice1: I can see why you like it

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: I can see why you like it.
Speaker.line2: They're indeed fancy hats.

Speaker.name: Evelyn_Happy
Speaker.line2: My father just bought it for me recently.

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: I afraid I'm not into this kind of hat.
Speaker.line2: It's not really my favorite.

Speaker.name: Evelyn_Happy
Speaker.line2: My father just bought it for me recently.

Speaker.name: Nathaniel_Happy
Speaker.line1: Silly Eve, didn't you get it from our birthday?

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: How was it? I heard there were a lot of people there.

Speaker.name: Nathaniel_Normal
Speaker.line2: It was just an event.

Speaker.name: Nathaniel_Happy
Speaker.line1: Anyway, did you hear about the new amusement park in Westside?

Choices.Choice1: Change the topic to play along
Choices.Choice2: Keep asking about the National Day Event

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line2: Is it a major attraction like the National Day Event?

Speaker.name: Nathaniel_Sad
Speaker.line1: But I'm not interested in that kind of event.

Speaker.name: Nathaniel_Happy
Speaker.line1: There will be the biggest carousel ever there!

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line2: Does the National Day Event have similar things?

Speaker.name: Nathaniel_Sad
Speaker.line1: But I'm not interested in that kind of event.

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line2: Is there anything you like in that event?

Speaker.name: Nathaniel_Normal
Speaker.line2: In the new amusement park I mentioned,

Speaker.name: Nathaniel_Happy
Speaker.line1: I heard that there will be The! Best! Rollercoaster! Ever!

Speaker.name: Nathaniel_Happy
Speaker.line1: I can't wait to go with you, sis.

Speaker.name: Nathaniel_Normal
Speaker.line1: Shall we ask mom to bring us before school starts?
